text: Todd Grisham (born January 9, 1976) is an American sports reporter. He works for DAZN and Glory kickboxing. Until the end of 2016, he worked for ESPN. He was the in-studio host for Friday Night Fights and a SportsCenter anchor. Grishem was a sports reporter for UFC from 2017 to 2020. Before starting to work for ESPN in 2011, Grisham worked as a professional wrestling commentator for WWE. As of January 2017, Grisham is working for the UFC as a broadcaster. == References == == Other websites == * * * Todd at Online World of Wrestling Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American sports commentators Category:Professional wrestling announcers Category:Sportspeople from Mississippi
title: Todd Grisham
